item.title: Doom Emacs Configuration
item.description: General Settings Bootstrappin' For some reason lexical-binding makes things faster. Let’s initialize all our files with this at the top. Here’s config.el’s ;;; $DOOMDIR/config.el -*- lexical-binding: t; -*- ;; DO NOT EDIT THIS FILE DIRECTLY ;; This is a file generated from a literate programing source file located at ;; `$HOME/.config/doom/config.org`. You should make any changes there and ;; regenerate it from Emacs org-mode using org-babel-tangle (C-c C-v t) Here’s init.
